snippet: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. proposed that raising the federal minimum wage might encourage Americans to spend more, which would help stimulate the economy.
abstract: Representative Jesse L Jackson Jr introduces a bill that would immediately increase the federal minimum wage by $2.75, to $10 an hour from $7.25; says raising the wage might encourage Americans to spend more, which would help stimulate the economy.
lead_paragraph: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. proposed that raising the federal minimum wage might encourage Americans to spend more, which would help stimulate the economy.

headline.main: Bill Pushes for Increase in Wages
headline.print_headline: Bill Pushes For Increase In Wages
